Package ParticleEngine.Visual

Class ColorKeyframe

  • java.lang.Object
    • ParticleEngine.Visual.ColorKeyframe
  • public class ColorKeyframe
extends java.lang.Object
    The ColorKeyframe class allows you to specify how the colors of particles should change over time. The best way to create keyframes is by writing them out into JSON, and using loadKeyframes()
    See Also:
    However, you can also manually push new keyframes in your java code using pushKeyframe(), Be aware that with this option you will have to manually call cacheFrames() to collect the color data. ColorKeyframes should be applied to a ParticleDrawable object, ParticleDrawable, ParticleDrawable.addKeyframes(ColorKeyframe)

        Parameters:

        frame - the frame number
